DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine efficacy high nicotine-specific antibody titer smoke cessation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability Immunogenicity 100µg NIC002 Vaccine Cigarette Smokers Who Are Motivated Quit Smoking .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female smoking subject age 18 65 year age Subjects must smoke 10 cigarette per day past 12 month The exhaled breath carbon monoxide ( CO ) concentration must 10 ppm screening . Urine cotinine screen must positive . The Fagerström Test Nicotine Dependence ( FTND ) score 5 screening . Attempted quit smoke three ( 3 ) month . Prior use smoke cessation aid . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
